similar.title: Short-term effects of mitigation measures for the containment of the COVID-19 outbreak: an experience from Northern Italy.
text: Short-term effects of mitigation measures for the containment of the COVID-19 outbreak: an experience from Northern Italy.

We evaluated the short-term effects of mitigation measures imposed by the Italian government on the first 10 municipalities affected by Sars-Cov-2 spread. Our results suggest that the effects of containment measures can be appreciated in about two weeks.
abstract: We evaluated the short-term effects of mitigation measures imposed by the Italian government on the first 10 municipalities affected by Sars-Cov-2 spread. Our results suggest that the effects of containment measures can be appreciated in about two weeks.
